Body: Scots is the closest language to English, after that perhaps Norwegian. Norwegian seems slightly closer to English than either Danish or Swedish is.

LastEditedUser.AboutMe: I've been working as a teacher of English and German for more than 10 years already. Linguistics is my life-long passion, I can speak and read no less than 12 languages well, I am studying Malay and Manju at the moment. My native languages are Ukrainian and Russian.
